#### First, let us get some intuition from it

```
>>> data_table = pd.read_csv("/home/yingshaoxo/500_Person_Gender_Height_Weight_Index.csv")

>>> data_table.head()
   Gender  Height  Weight  Index
0    Male     174      96      4
1    Male     189      87      2
2  Female     185     110      4
3  Female     195     104      3
4    Male     149      61      3
```
___

#### For our case, we only need the height and weight about the 500 person
